execution_plan.description: Retrieve EU customers whose email is NULL, empty, or does not match a basic valid email pattern from the sales_eu customers table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, full_name, email, country, updated_at FROM customers WHERE email IS NULL OR trim(email) = '' OR email !~ '^[^@[:space:]]+@[^@[:space:]]+\.[^@[:space:]]+$';
